text:
Toast to Friendship at The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore
Gather your friends and spend quality time together reveling in the perfect staycation at The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore. Relish the companionship of close friends and enjoy the exceptional service of our Ladies and Gentlemen, which promise to make your stay truly unforgettable.
Centrally situated in the heart of Marina Bay, the hotel’s accessible location allows you to easily explore over 2,000 shopping and dining options in the vicinity, or spend a day at various Marina Bay attractions such as Gardens by the Bay, the ArtScience Museum or the Merlion Park.
If you are planning to stay in and play catch up, we recommend a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool followed by an indulgent treat at The Ritz-Carlton spa, where the deft hands of our experienced therapists will knead away all your worldly concerns.
In the evenings, toast to friendship with a complimentary bottle of Louis Roederer champagne while soaking in panoramic views of the city skyline in our enhanced guestrooms, which feature an additional oversized plush daybed that is convertible to a twin Ritz-Carlton sleep experience.
“A Toast to Friendship” room package includes:
Overnight accommodation in an Enhanced Premier Room Buffet breakfast for three adults One plush bathrobe each for three guests 20% privilege on spa treatments One bottle of Louis Roederer champagne per stay
Valid through 29 December 2015, the room package is priced from SGD 650 for an Enhanced Premier Room. Enjoy 20% savings on every additional room reserved.
Source:- Ritz-Carlton
